item.title: JC/About
item.description: About Me I am a PhD Candidate at SCSE, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. My research is funded by ASTAR SINGA scholarship. Research Interests Artificial intelligence, multi-agent systems, computational game theory, decision making, bounded rationality, robustness, optimization, cooperation Education MSc summa cum laude in Artificial Intelligence (major) and Robotics (minor) at FEE, CTU in Prague MSc in Discrete Models and Algorithms at Department of Applied Mathematics, FMP, Charles University Publications Journal papers

item.title: JC/Contact
item.description: Email: [«mylastname»@disroot.org] Mailing Address NTU, N4-B1A-02 Nanyang Avenue Singapore 639798
